name: Discord
description: Interact with Discord servers through a bot. Send messages, manage channels, read message history, and manage server settings via the Discord Bot API.

inputs.label: Discord Bot Token
inputs.description: Discord bot token for authentication. Requires Message Content, Server Members, and Presence intents enabled.

obtain.instructions:
1. Go to Discord Developer Portal
2. Click 'New Application' and create your app
3. Navigate to Bot section
4. Click 'Reset Token' to generate a new bot token
5. Enable Message Content, Server Members, and Presence intents
6. Copy the token

auth.instructions: Create a Discord bot at https://discord.com/developers/applications and copy the bot token.
